title: Looking for Joe
creator_credit: Andrew Buchanan and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
brief_description: 2D and 3D combine in this tribute to film noir. Time and perspective are toyed with as the story weaves between character viewpoints - the viewer’s sense of disorientation is heightened by the striking visual style.
